description:
Learn how to beat procrastination and accelerate your progress toward your goals with this course.

Build a strong understanding of procrastination. Learn how to defeat procrastination, improve your productivity and maintain your motivation with this course for entrepreneurs, business professionals, managers and others.

  • Reasons for procrastination.
  • Signs of procrastination.
  • Perils of procrastination.
  • Common triggers for procrastination.
  • The effect of your lifestyle on your motivation.

A Powerful Course At Your Fingertips.

Being able to defeat procrastination is of the utmost importance to you as an entrepreneur, business professional or manager.

Content And Overview

Suitable for all entrepreneurs, business professionals, managers and others, through this course you will learn the quick and easy tips on beating procrastination.

With these mastered, the course will take you through removing distractions, using productivity tools, stress management, wise use of time, setting up your desk to increase productivity and altering negative thought patterns to improve your productivity.

Students completing this course will be able to defeat procrastination and accelerate their progress toward their goals.
title: Beating Procrastination And Accelerating Progress
